remarks: Cancellation law for subtraction ( ~ npcan analog).  (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
grpsubadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grpnpcan $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .- Y ) .+ Y ) = X ) $.
